body_text: Ah, that makes sense! The Bazel C++ tutorial covers all of the concepts that you need to know, although for simple projects you might get just as far by copying the rule for one of the TensorFlow C++ binaries (e.g.).
body: Ah, that makes sense! The [Bazel C++ tutorial](http://bazel.io/docs/cpp.html) covers all of the concepts that you need to know, although for simple projects you might get just as far by copying the rule for one of the TensorFlow C++ binaries ([e.g.](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/cf1659d1c233f8ddbee13fd298464d76e58bdccb/tensorflow/cc/BUILD#L61)).
